projectPurpose: To provide a highly user-friendly, interactive, and discoverable command-line shell experience with advanced features working out of the box.

alternatives.name: PowerShell Core
mainFeatures: Integration with structured data and APIs

marketPositioning: Fish positions itself as 'The user-friendly command line shell', prioritizing ease of use and out-of-the-box functionality over strict POSIX compliance. Its market position is as a modern, interactive shell that provides advanced features like autosuggestions and rich tab completions with minimal configuration, appealing to users who want a more intuitive command-line experience compared to traditional shells like Bash and Zsh, which often require extensive customization for similar features. Its web-based configuration tool further enhances its user-friendly approach.
